ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of the firm of accountants PRICE WATERHOUSE COOPERS of Ottawa, Ontario, to audit the affairs and to perform the annual audits of the Bank of Canada for the five fiscal years (2006-2010) inclusive.
